import React from 'react' import { MapContainer, TileLayer, useMap,Marker,Popup } from 'react-leaflet' import { Icon } from 'leaflet' import FlightInfo from './FlightInfo' const MapView = () => { const position = [51.505, -0.09] const flightIcon=new Icon({ iconUrl:'flight.png', iconSize:[25,25] }); return ( A pretty CSS3 popup.
Easily customizable. ) } export default MapView
